# E.V.A. by NullPointers (ZeloKulNekiAIZadeva)
![alt text](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/96949730/416017644-bd612d20-f87a-4fe0-bcb8-51808b2478cc.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..TiKMdgx67WsjBnFbxn4Ny5eG_gaTX9ohDbhgdm-pTZI)

### Description:
An AI virtual instructor made in Unity, with openAI API, chatGPT, Whisper and TTS. 

### How to start program:
Open folder named "predstavitu" and run "ZeloKulNekiAIZadeva.exe"
***
